longTitle.p: An Act to give validity to the operation of the general
Regulations and Acts within the Dehra dun.
WHEREAS it is necessary to give validity to the operation of the general Regulations and Acts within the district under the
Superintendent of the Dehra Dun ; It is hereby enacted as follows:--

section.heading: Extension of Regulations and Acts in force in Saharanpur to

content.p: Dehra Dun. The Regulations and Acts now in force in the district
Saharanpur are hereby declared to extend to the said district of Dehra

section.heading: Jurisdiction of High Court and Board of Revenue over Dehra

content.p: Dun. The High Court and the Board of Revenue of Uttar Pradesh]
shall exercise respectively, in the said district, all the powers which the said High Court or Board of Revenue are at present,
respectively, authorized to exercise in any part of Agra].

section.heading: District Court of Saharanpur to be District Court of Dehra

content.p: Dun. The District Court of Saharanpur shall be the District Court of such district until the State Government otherwise directs .

section.heading: Exemption of Jaunsar Bawar. Nothing in this Act shall apply to that portion of the Dehra Dun district called Jaunsar Bawar .
